product_description: Cream cheese/cold smoked salmon (Gravlox) spread in plastic containers. CREAM CHEESE (PASTEURIZED MILK AND CREAM, CHEESE CULTURE, SALT.***SELL BY 02.06.13***PACK DATE: 01.30.13***"  There is a light blue water mark behind the ingredient statement that reads: "WHOLE FOODS MARKET"

reason_for_recall: Cold-smoked salmon trim, used to manufacture this cream cheese spread, was processed the same day as a surveillance sample was processed, that was found positive for Listeria monocytogenes.

reason_for_recall: Source of whey ingredient not listed as milk, an allergen.Consumers who have an allergy or severe sensitivity to milk run the risk of a serious or life-threatening allergic reaction if they consume these products.

reason_for_recall: Dried pineapple which contains sulfur dioxide was accidently used to manufacturer the trail mix.  The formula calls for untreated dried pineapple.
distribution_pattern: Product was distributed to 7 US consignees and 4 Canadian consignees.
product_description: Item #1910 Kettle brand Honey Roast Harvest trail mix UPC 8411401910  Label reads in part "8411401910 Honey Roast Harvest Mix Net Weight 24 Lbs.***"

reason_for_recall: The products are being recalled due to the receipt of a relatively high number of consumer complaints.
distribution_pattern: Product was distributed nationwide and included military distribution.  Foreign distribution was made to Panama and Belize.
